main.name: Bhavya Goyal
main.bio: I'm a junior at IIIT-K, pursuing my BTech in Computer Science Engineering with an interest in [Pentesting, Competitive Programming]. I have done some Full-Stack work in web and app development. Looking forward to connecting with people and learning new technologies.

projects.title: BigSy (Smart India Hackathon 2022 Winner)
projects.dis: A unified form of database software that can search text within any format of data/file such as jpeg, png, pdf, word, SQL,JSON, CSV, audio files. Build for Madhya Pradesh State Police under PS AT980.

projects.title: Partners in crime
projects.dis: Platform build to connect students belonging to same college to Particate in Hackathons hosted on various web sites.

projects.title: Valentina
projects.dis: Sociallizing App build for IIIT Kottayam students build using React Native(EXPO) and firebase with End-to-End encryted chat feature.

projects.title: UPSIDA
projects.dis: A website developed during a Hackathon hosted by Uttar Pradesh government.

projects.title: E-commerce API
projects.dis: Basic E-commerce API build using NodeJs-Express

projects.title: GFG Webhacks
projects.dis: A frontend developed during a Hackathon hosted by Geeks for Geeks.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.dis: Tic-Tac-Toe game build using the undefeatable MinMax algo.

projects.title: Url Shortner
projects.dis: url shorter build using python-django web framework.
